title: Isan Thai Restaurant
typeOfFood: Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small restaurant with a separate  vegetarian menu section, of which some are vegan or can be made vegan. Many other menu items can be prepared vegan with tofu and/or vegetables. Accommodating staff is happy to leave out fish sauce, egg and other ingredients where necessary. Free Wi-Fi. Spice levels can be modified upon request.
